rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer with Vastu-aligned entrance for positive energy flow.
rooms.vastu_notes: North-east corner placement for welcoming positive energies.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large area blending Brutalist design with open spaces. Concrete exposed finishes and geometric forms.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed in the south-east corner to maintain balance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining space adjacent to living room. Incorporates raw materials like concrete and glass.
rooms.vastu_notes: Adjacent to kitchen ensuring easy access.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional, minimalistic kitchen with Brutalist aesthetics. Features an open layout that connects with dining.
rooms.vastu_notes: North-west corner recommended to avoid heavy activity in the south.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet, well-lit library featuring exposed concrete and ample shelving. Designed for introspection.
rooms.vastu_notes: East side placement for intellectual energy.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Secluded home theater space with acoustic treatment and Brutalist finishes. Features a large screen area.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed in the west to minimize distractions from daily activities.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Single bedroom with spacious balcony. Uses raw concrete and glass windows for natural light.
rooms.vastu_notes: North-west corner to promote relaxation and privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with an extensive balcony. Incorporates Brutalist style with modern comforts.
rooms.vastu_notes: South-east location to support calm energy and privacy.

openings.description: Spacious balcony extending from master bedroom for relaxation and ventilation.
Spacious balcony attached to guest bedroom for natural ventilation.
Entrance porch that doubles as a transitional space from outdoor to indoor.
openings.vastu_notes: Aligned with main entrance for auspicious entry.

openings.description: Large windows in living and library areas to allow natural light while preserving privacy.
openings.vastu_notes: North-facing windows recommended for calm energy.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space allocated for storage and minor household utilities, adhering to Brutalist simplicity.
rooms.vastu_notes: South-west corner placement to maintain order.

rooms.name: Additional Workspace
rooms.description: Flexible area that can serve as a study or home office. Minimalist design with exposed concrete.
rooms.vastu_notes: East side placement to boost creativity.

openings.description: Open staircase connecting ground and split-level floors. Raw concrete finish.
openings.vastu_notes: Central placement ensures balanced energy flow.

building_norms.compliance: Indian residential and commercial building norms
